resources.string: Test your knowledge in Python language and click play to start a quiz

byePy will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn about Python programing language. 

Is an easy to use application that allows you to test your knowledge in Python language. 

With list of different quiz questions, which cover a variety of topics, this quiz app will help you to get even more inspiration for learning.
Here we will provide several links for you, where you can learn more about Python and be prepared for this quiz.

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question. 

If you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game. 

Choose level and measure your perfomances.
Thank you for playing! Share your result with friends or play again.
